explanation: Several participants are expressing bullish price targets (105k, 108.2k, 125k), referencing new all-time highs (ATH), and discussing possible significant upward moves if the dollar crashes. However, some skepticism and mentions of bear control and possible bull trap temper overall confidence, resulting in a 'medium' confidence buy signal.
